1.title: The Rise of Lin Chung
1.plot: During a time of great doubt, Lin Chung is reunited with his martial arts master. Now in spectral form, Tien Khuan gives Lin Chung three fighting tasks. As he battles Firefly King, Rhino King and Shark King -- the forces of air, earth and water -- he learns to use a new power.

6.title: Big Baby Turtles
6.plot: The Zebra Brothers have stolen a magical amulet from the Owl tribe. First Squad chases the bad boys down, but just as they were in reach, their turtle mounts poop out. Back at base, ApeTrully offers the turtles a much-needed break, but Mighty Ray, still infuriated, hurts their feelings. Feeling unloved the turtles leave and fall into HighRoller's hands.

7.title: Shadow Monster/Duo Cannon

9.title: The Return of the Pterodactyls/White Crane
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: The Eyes of Mighty Ray
10.plot: ApeTrully must lead Mighty Ray and First Squad deep into the Monkey King's temple, reveal the true source of Mighty Ray's fantastic orbs and seek assistance. The Monkey King shows Mighty Ray how to "see" out of his eyes when they are used by TwinMasters. First Squad quickly finds TwinMasters' hiding place on Mt. Hima, but in order to beat their enemy, Mighty Ray must risk going blind... forever.

11.title: Animal Collector/Resurrection of T-Rex
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Revenge of the Commander of Darkness/The Sword of Dark Fire
12.plot: Evidenced by a terrible disturbance brewing over its tomb, the ancient Sword of Dark Fire has been unearthed. With the power to destroy entire animal castles or even Big Green, First Squad must destroy the sword before it falls into the wrong hands. In a race to beat HighRoller to the magical weapon, Lin Chung and team must fight the Beetle Army, Cave Eels and the undead Guardians of the Sword.

13.title: Enter the Dragon/Ninja Fight
13.plot: The Commander of Darkness is at it again! He's brewed a new potion and now can control dragons! During an airborne assault on Big Green, he kidnaps Mystique Sonia and takes her to his lair in the strange rock formations known as the Caves of Teipeto. First Squad and the Air Force deploy, and a hair-raising aerial battle ensues. Meanwhile, Mystique Sonia works some magic of her own.

14.title: Fox King and the Arachno Tanks/The Ghost Ship
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: Jelly Fish Jam/Demon Heartland
15.plot: While performing routine sea maintenance, First Squad is attacked by jellyfish. Of course, jellyfish stings are never nice - but these pack an extra mini-punch, shrinking First Squad to miniature versions of their former selves. Quickly scooped up by the Zebra Brothers, First Squad and the Jelly Fish King find themselves fish-napped.

16.title: Leech King/The Third Squad

23.title: High Roller Hydra/Time to Go Homes
23.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

24.title: Marine Mine/About Faces
24.plot: The Blowfish have aligned themselves with HighRoller and are attacking Big Green with a vicious "Spine Barrage." After a hair-raising battle, First Squad holds back the Blowfish Warriors, while Sammo "torpedos" Lin Chung toward a one on one fight with the Blowfish King.

25.title: The Professionals/Swamp Hippos
25.plot: ApeTrully receives an unusual report. The Dog Pack, loyal members of Big Green, are attacking human villages. Wu Sung, the Dental Warrior, knows that his brother, the Dog King, has had difficulty leading a domesticated life and vows to stop him from causing more destruction. But when Wu Sung and First Squad arrive on the scene, things aren't as they seem.

26.title: The Bronze Giant
26.plot: Among the ruins of Big Green, we find First Squad with a handful of animal Kings left at their sides. TwinMasters' power is quickly depleting the life energy from Hidden Kingdom. Lin Chung finds a design he had made of a Bronze Giant - the power points of which include all 107 heroes of Big Green. It is Hero: 108, and if Lin Chung can bring the heroes together, Big Green just may have a chance.

1.title: Rabbit Castle/Elephant Castle
1.plot: ApeTrully tries to negotiate peace between the rabbits and humans, but instead becomes a captive of the rabbits. First Squadron must now battle the furry creatures in a jump-roping competition, with ApeTrully's life and the future of humanity hanging in the balance.

2.title: Liger Castle/Camel Castle
2.plot: ApeTrully is surprised when he visits Liger Castle and they eagerly agree to peace with Big Green. But when he discovers the Ligers are actually Highroller's minions, First Squadron must come to the rescue and defeat the Ligers in a ring toss competition.

3.title: Parrot Castle/Turtle Cannon Competition
3.plot: ApeTrully is reunited with his teacher, the Parrot King, while negotiating a truce between the Parrots and humans. However, the peace is quickly jeopardized when the evil Zebra Brothers use their magic ghost lanterns to hypnotize the two leaders, as well as First Squadron who've come to the rescue.

4.title: Pandaffe Castle/Eagle Castle
4.plot: First Squad attends a concert by the beautiful Rattle Diva, but Mystique Sonia and Mighty Ray's rowdy behavior at the performance causes a ruckus between Big Green and the Pandaffe (Panda and Giraffe) Castle.

5.title: Baboon Castle/Folk Game Competition
5.plot: First Squad attempts to help the Baboons of Baboon Castle overcome their infestation of mind-controlling fleas, but their only hope is to defeat the baboons in a top-spinning competition.

6.title: Pitched Battle of the Tank Army
6.plot: Lin Chung, Parrot King and Camel King discover the whereabouts of a magical treasure which has the power to turn humans into animals. Unfortunately, the Sparky Brothers have also discovered the treasure and informed Highroller, who enlists the help of the Chameleon Queen in a full-scale battle against Big Green to gain control of the gem

7.title: Camel Castle II/Turtle Cannon Competition II
7.plot: The Camel King defeats Lin Chung in a painting competition and in the process decides he's no longer inspired by Big Green. He convinces the Camels to take back their kingdom and overrun the humans, until Lin Chung and First Squad can create a masterpiece that impresses Camel King enough to come back.

8.title: Elephant Castle II/Peacock Castle
8.plot: Mystique Sonia tries to help the Elephant King find some fun while supplying cool air for Big Green. Unfortunately, the Zebra Brothers convince the Elephant King to turn against Big Green, leading to a hot and very muddy battle!

9.title: Pitched Battle of the Navies
9.plot: After a meteorite lands in the ocean and transforms into a giant island-devouring Soil Monster, First Squad uses Sammo the submarine whale to reach the monster. However, Highroller learns of the Soil Monster from the Bald Eagles and is determined to make it one of his minons.

10.title: Dog Castle/Rhino Castle
10.plot: First Squad is called into action to rescue ApeTrully from the Dog King, but the only way for them earn the trust of the Dog Kingdom is to defeat them in a dog sled race.

11.title: Lion Castle/Crocodile Castle
11.plot: First Squad attempts to rescue ApeTrully after he's taken captive by the Lion King and used as a basketball. Although they are defeated with help from Redfaced Kwan and his infantry, the Lions will only surrender if someone from Big Green can beat them in a hoops competition.

12.title: Cat Castle/Cheetah Castle
12.plot: ApeTrully becomes excited when he sees the Cat King has the Zebra Brothers in captivity. However, his laughter about the situation upsets the Cats and they take him prisoner as well.

13.title: Air Battle/Shark Castle
13.plot: Big Green comes under attack by Eagles and when the Air Force cannot save them, First Squad is called into action. Unfortunately, Lin Chung's bamboo shoots - which would otherwise be effective against the Eagles - have been eaten, but Jumpy Ghostface comes up with a backup plan that might just work.

14.title: Parrot Castle II/Folk Game Competition II
14.plot: Jumpy Ghostface and Parrot King pay a visit to Parrot Castle, only to discover the Parrots have been overrun by The Dark Legion. Once they too are taken captive by the Dark Legion, an army of Jumpy Ghostface clones suddenly appear and take on Dark Legion to save the day.

15.title: Snake Castle/Octopus Castle
15.plot: First Squad must battle The Snakes in order to save ApeTrully, but Mystique Sonia is terrified of snakes. Once her comrades are taken hostage, she must find a way to overcome her fears and rescue them all.

16.title: Egret Ox Castle/Firework Festival at East Citadel
16.plot: ApeTrully is taken captive by the Egret and Ox tribes after attempting to negotiate a peace treaty. First Squad is called in to rescue him, but after an epic battle, a swarm of locusts begin eating the tribes' rice paddies and everyone pitches in to help save their food supply.

17.title: Chameleon Castle/Bald Eagle Castle
17.plot: HighRoller takes ApeTrully captive during a peace mission to Chameleon Castle. Unfortunately, First Squad cannot get into the castle because of land mines and intense fog.

18.title: Crab Castle/Fierce Battle of the Pig and Skunk Armies
18.plot: Sammo the Whale wants to prove his bravery so he joins First Squad and the Sailor Brothers in rescuing humans who are being trapped by crabs at Crab Castle. However, the Crab King will not give up unless Lin Chung can defeat him in a sand sculpting competition.

19.title: Pitched Battle of the Great Wall Train
19.plot: Wu Sung and Parrot King set out to find strong herbs and avoid an outbreak of dental problems at Big Green. In their search, they come across the Great Wall Train of the Tiger Tribe and must act quickly to rescue the humans being taken captive and forced to run the train.

20.title: Turtle Cannon Competition III/Scorpion Castle
20.plot: Second Squad and Chameleon Queen join forces to compete against First Squad in a Turtle Cannon Competition. But when an avalanche threatens ApeTrully's life, First Squad must attempt to save him, even though it could mean losing the competition.

21.title: Table Soccer Competition/Groundhog Castle
21.plot: HighRoller issues a challenge to First Squad to compete in a giant Table Soccer match. As usual, HighRoller is up to his old cheating tricks, but this time the Squad is ready and the competition is ultimately decided by a kissing match.

22.title: Duckbill Castle/Ostrich Castle
22.plot: ApeTrully leads the Tank Army to Duckbill Castle to negotiate a peace treaty, but the ducks refuse and take him prisoner. As his distress signal reaches First Squad, Lin Chung happens to be nearby with Cheetah King and Queen and they join forces to battle the Duckbills.

23.title: Deer Castle/Porcupine Castle
23.plot: First Squad must rescue ApeTrully after he's been taken prisoner by the Deer King. Unfortunately, the deers' vibrating antlers are too powerful for First Squad. However, Mystique Sonia discovers a flower with seeds that can grow buns which turn solid things soft.

24.title: Sheep Castle/Penguin Castle
24.plot: The Sheep Queen and her army take ApeTrully captive, but First Squad's rescue fails because they are tricked into wearing wool sweaters which are really traps.

25.title: Frog Castle/Cheetah Castle II
25.plot: First Squad discovers that the Frogs are abusing humans at Frog Castle, but when they take action, the Frog Army's sticky tongues are too much for them. Fortunately, Mystique Sonia's powerful tongue can help save everyone, but first they'll need some help from everyone's favorite singer, the Rattle Diva.

26.title: Pitched Battle of the Air Force
26.plot: Woo the Wise creates a crystal-based machine that can mix several different animals into one. HighRoller, not to be outdone, combines the Bald Eagles with Bats and Hens to create "The Ultimate Wing Fighting Force."

imdb.plot outline: Many years ago in the Hidden Kingdom, animals and humans lived in perfect harmony. One day, an evil trickster named High Roller arrived in the Hidden Kingdom, became ruler of the East Citadel, and fooled the animals into thinking that humans were their enemies. Chaos reigned until an individual named Commander ApeTrully formed Big Green as a task force to restore peace between the humans and animals. Big Green's elite warriors are First Squad consisting of Mr. No Hands, Lin Chung, Mystique Sonia, Mighty Ray, and Jumpy Ghostface the Rabbit King. First Squad ends up helping Commander ApeTrully to make peace with each of the animals while fighting High Roller and the Zebra Brothers Sparky Black and Sparky White.
imdb.title: Hero: 108
plot: Big Green, a peacekeeping force of superhumans and animals, work to establish peace between the kingdoms of humans and animals.::Q. Leo Rahman

Many years ago in the Hidden Kingdom, animals and humans lived in perfect harmony. One day, an evil trickster named High Roller arrived in the Hidden Kingdom, became ruler of the East Citadel, and fooled the animals into thinking that humans were their enemies. Chaos reigned until an individual named Commander ApeTrully formed Big Green as a task force to restore peace between the humans and animals. Big Green's elite warriors are First Squad consisting of Mr. No Hands, Lin Chung, Mystique Sonia, Mighty Ray, and Jumpy Ghostface the Rabbit King.
